attributes.title: Trumpies 🤮
attributes.review: I really thought 🧠 this app could have some useful information 📖 but it’s just the 🍊 being a racist. Constantly crashes, can’t even open the app without throwing up 🤢

this app is awful i tried to escape it but i couldnt un download it! please don’t download it!! please its scary! 0/10 i was captured by trump and trump screamed at me and my family my sister and brother were fighting back but i got launched into the ocean and drowned the sharks eat me alive after i already died and a rabyed  fish tried to fight the shark the shark died along with me.  at my  funeral trump was there and started to down talk the whole family please i beg of u don’t download this app

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: after downloading it which took multiple days it kinda just crashed my phone and hacked my apps. after that i got a call saying i need to vote for trump or else my phone will be shut down.... DO NOT RECCOMEND

attributes.title: app is trash
attributes.review: It keeps exiting out the app constantly...and it’s slowing snapchat and instagram down as soon as I downloaded it. In addition, trump is a horrible president that makes decisions depending on his emotions. What a complete clown. Apple please delete this application.

attributes.title: This app is full of AIDS
attributes.review:
The app took soo much storage from my phone and then once I opened the app my phone glitched a lot and then I started receiving many calls to vote for an orange I was was so confused
I don’t recommend this app at all

attributes.title: This app is useless
attributes.review: Why do we even need this app? Most people hate trump and he shouldn’t have a second term! I want this app to be deleted because also you wanna ban TikTok from the US we’re not letting that happen.

attributes.title: please do NOT download
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to stay in touch with what’s happening and out of the blue DONALD TRUMP knocks on my door and comes and kidnaps me luckily my dog was there to bite his cheeks so please if you download this app leave a 1 star and a bad review or they will track you 😉

attributes.title: WACK
attributes.review: i literally died when i saw this app, i saw an orange looking man in the front who scared me so bad i peed. why wouldn’t they put a WARNING!!!😡😡. so bad already . then when i kept looking there were spams and the orange ma pretending to be the president!! very bad, would not reccomend AT ALL. HORROR SHOCK AND EVEN WORSE: A CHEETO!! 0/5

attributes.title: horrific
attributes.review: when i went on this app, trump himself popped out of the screen and stole my cat and all my belongings, INCLUDING the ashes of my grandma. why would he need my grandmother? why did we elect a grandmother stealer. never using this app again. my grandpa is devastated.
